website_summaries.verdict: These cute, unique flip-flops were specifically designed to handle shower drainage.
pros: Include unique drainage hole designs and slip resistant soles
Antimicrobial layers and slip resistant soles to protect your feet
cons: Drainage holes can mildly pinch the feet when walking, but these aren't intended for long distances

customer_reviews.title: A tad uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit, love they are antimicrobial, happy they don’t leave black marks like my old flip flops, but found the cutouts are uncomfortable and the thought of water coming up through the holes like another reviewer remarked kind of grosses me out.
customer_reviews.author: C.Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is WAY OFF!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in these. The sizing is way off. TOO LARGE! I wear a size 6. I ordered the 5/6 size small and still too big. The thong part that goes between your big toe and the next toe is too far down the shoe, making it for my toes to nearly go off the top of the shoe and consequently way too much room left after the heel. Even the straps are too loose. Hard to walk and still keep the shoes on. I CANNOT RECOMMEND THESE SHOES.
customer_reviews.author: Dot Com

customer_reviews.title: These flip flops are great for showering in at the gym
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are great for showering in at the gym. They have great grip on the concrete floor and dry quickly. They are comfortable for showering and wearing home when I forget my other shoes, but not the best for wearing for long periods of time. The holes hurt a bit after walking for long periods of time. That is not necessarily the purpose of these flip flops though, so no biggie deal. They are perfect for gym showers!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Great shower shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am a college student who lives in suite-style dorms. My suite mates and roommates don't like doing their share of cleaning. These shower shoes are the prefect fix to protect me from any bacteria that may be lingering on the shower floor. They are non-slip and they dry quickly. They are also very comfortable which is often hard to find with flip flops. Definitely worth the purchase and I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fine shower shoes, but overpowering plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the flip flops, but they smell like a plastics factory. This kind of off-gassing will surely dissipate, but in the meantime, be forewarned that if you put them in an enclosed space (like a bag or a locker), the smell will be very strong. Probably not something you want to be inhaling, if you treasure your brain cells.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Harris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, lightweight and great for everyday wear!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, I love ShowaFlops!! It is not as thin as they look like in the pictures so you don’t feel you are too close to the ground. It’s great quality, I have been wearing them nonstop since I got them - for dog walks, going to the grocery store, for evening stroll in the neighborhood and just lounging. Very lightweight, great color!!! Also the drainage holes is a great idea, it has great grip. I always get a mule with flip flops, but ShowaFlops is different. They are very comfortable! The best thing to that they are antimicrobial so they help keep the fungus away!
customer_reviews.author: Nirmal Utwani

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: They do what they say - I use these for the gym several times a week as shower shoes and also as pool shoes. I have not slipped once in the month I've had them (that's really impressive, as I'm used to slipping around in flop-flops). I do not find them uncomfortable, but I also wear them only for the gym (so not for long periods of time). They're pricey for flip-flops, but if they continue to hold up (I expect they will), I'd happily purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The holes in the bottom feel a bit weird at first, but allow super quick drying. I bought these to put on when I get out of the shower, but I usually wear them around the house for long after.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: Using for showers at the gym, works great, I like the drainage holes in them so they don't get weird and squishy when they get wet and they dry out fairly quickly. I wear a size 5.5 and got the 5/6 and these are pretty big on me.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Durable and served the purpose!
customer_reviews.text: I got these sandals when moving into a dorm with a community bathroom. I felt comfortable walking in my hallway and into the bathroom with these. I survived the year without any infections, so it seems as though they were effective! They feel very durable and I’d be happy using them again if I were to use a community shower in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Order a two sizes up
customer_reviews.text: Way too tight and small, I’m a size 7 1/2 and I order an 8 for my hospital bag so that it would fit perfect and they didn’t work. I thought that maybe because my feet were swollen they didn’t fit but 10 months later and they still don’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ojitos Tristes

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortbale
customer_reviews.text: I don;t find these very comfortable. The strap between toes is very stiff and I feel the tabs that hold the straps on underneath. THey are also pretty heavy IMHO. Disappointed, bit not worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: Bichon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, design and fit
customer_reviews.text: I needed flip flops for the shower at the gym. I looked at these, but ended up ordering some Crocs. They were too wide and big, so I returned them and came back to this pair. I am so happy I made the swap! These are super soft and thick, the straps are comfortable, and the drainage holes are so smart. They also feel grippy on the bottom. Super pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Best idea ever. I was using regular flip flops to shower at the gym. They stayed wet, were slippery & broke. SO glad to find these! Water drains through, they are not slippery because of the grips and dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: h48371d

customer_reviews.title: These are the ultimate shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: I no longer have to worry about falling dine due to slick tubs. They drain via holes, so you don't slid off and they grab the surface and they don't hurt between the toes and they are antibacterial.
customer_reviews.author: W. Green

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly (bought 9/10 L and wear a 9 personally) and worked great. That first step out of the gym shower is still a doozy, but I don't think ANY shower shoes will defeat a poor tile choice. In the shower, the shoes didn't hold water and they dried quickly once I made it to my locker. I look forward to using these daily and the heart design that makes up the drain holes makes me smile.
customer_reviews.author: ~heavv~

customer_reviews.title: Good price and does what it should.
customer_reviews.text: They get the job done, they're not uncomfortable for short use but they aren't comfortable enough to wear around the pool or river or anything, just in the shower. Good value though.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in hospital shower and I had no problems with ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my hospital go bag during pregnancy. Worked great in hospital shower and I had no problems with any slipping! I love them and I am keeping them for use at the pool this summer. My feet felt drier than any other shower flip flops I have tried and they themselves dried rather quickly. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: C Hearting

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym shower!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shower shoes! They fit true to size, are comfortable to wear around the gym locker room and in the shower, and do not slip even when wet. By the time I'm dressed and ready to put the shoes in my bag, they are dry. Great product and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gym, college or camp showers.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter to use in her college shower. They are perfect for the shower and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: My size is 9. But there 9-10 and I order that. But it is big, not good. Size here not exactly. Not great!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: nice pair of squeaky flip flops to protect my feet from the fungus among us!
customer_reviews.text: No problems yet. The only thing I don't like is that when my feet are wet, they squeak a lot! I don't know, maybe just about all flip flops will do this. Worth it if you can get a good deal on them. $20+ was a bit much for me. I got these for $16.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Fast-drying, perfect for pool showers
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT comfortable flip flops for walking around town (lest you think they can do double duty), but they're wonderful for taking to the pool or using for locker room showers because they dry really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ClassicalTraining

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great - comfortable, cute and work so well in the pool and shower. The water drains out and they don't slip. So happy to have found these.
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many types of flip flops for public showers and these are the best. The heart shaped holes allows the water to drain off your flip flops and they dry fairly quick so you're not having to put soaking wet flip flops in your gym bag. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if the holes do anything more than if I was wearing a regular flip flop in the shower, but I like these.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Way too small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: NOT what I expected. Narrow and too small. Kept them but haven’t even used them. Wanted them for shower shoes in the hospital and couldn’t put my feet in them. So sad. I loved the idea of these
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wish I liked these but I just don’t. Those handy holes in the shoes HURT. The design needs to be changed. I use them for the shower at the gym and in the locker room.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Aniem

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for travelling when I walk to an from the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for travelling when I walk to an from the showers and I keep them on during as well... they don't slip and they are comforatable!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Q

customer_reviews.title: Shower Flipflops
customer_reviews.text: Love these for taking showers away from home. Feel so much better than worrying about potential foot fungus in public showrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best for college students
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Very comfortable and secure. They fit just as they say they do. Would recommend for college students!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: i've seen a lot of comments about it hating/pinching feet ...
customer_reviews.text: i've seen a lot of comments about it hating/pinching feet. have not had any issues and use daily for college showers. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: tclark

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and they to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for college for her showers, and she loved them
customer_reviews.author: Cherell G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, no slip shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: Used these today at the gym. The sandals are unusually heavy. I did not slip at all. I felt secure while walking on the wet floor. I
customer_reviews.author: Short and Shapely

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with great features
customer_reviews.text: Love that the flops drain. Size fits as expected and blue color is fun. Comfortable! Not stiff and hard like so many other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Beaverhead Treasures

customer_reviews.title: My daughter uses these in the dorm and loves the ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these in the dorm and loves the draining ability of the water. Keeps her feet safe while showering in the community shower.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas shopper

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for the shower
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my feet healthy! These are perfect for the shower, but I would not say that I want to wear them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Great for pool/shower but I do wish they didn't squeak.
customer_reviews.author: mikki1006

customer_reviews.title: Pinches bottom of foot...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little hearts holes pinches bottom of foot, hurts to walk. Two stars cause they're pretty. Can only wear them in shower area at pool otherwise they pick up little pieces of gravel and thats annoying too
customer_reviews.author: pogue

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute flip flops! They are comfortable however I can feel the holes when I wear them. It feels like a little pinch. No biggie. I use them for the pool and gym shower. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for dorm bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to wear in her dorm bathroom. She loves them! They fit perfectly, the holes allow for quick drying & they are fashionable!
customer_reviews.author: Molly P.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure they would work properly but they do and the purple color is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: S. Silva

customer_reviews.title: But overall my daughter is pleased with them to keep her feet above the ground ...
customer_reviews.text: They hurt a little bit when wet just becasue the holes made some suction. also the XO was a bit too juvenile for college. But overall my daughter is pleased with them to keep her feet above the ground in dorm showers.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Very happy, have owned a short time, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: They STINK!
customer_reviews.text: The pink plastic smells a horrible plastic smell. I’ve left them in the bathroom of a friend’s house right after I got them, while visiting and the whole bathroom smelled of plastic. They have been sitting on my front porch for weeks now and still smell of plastic. I am trying to return them. Don’t buy these – They STINK - nice idea but poor quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shower flip flops
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Held together through a freshman college year. Super nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great shower camping sandals!
customer_reviews.text: So perfect for camping and taking showers in those questionable stalls!! I wear a 9.5 shoe size and these fit perfectly. Cute and comfy too!
customer_reviews.author: Beejerson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the shower
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable sandals. Great when taking a shower at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Shannie

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with these bad boys
customer_reviews.text: Oh yes, I'm in love with these bad boys. They are absolutely better than my regular, old flip flops, and I love the little holes in the bottom that allow my feet to actually DRY while wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: HYM

customer_reviews.title: I use them whenever I travel
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I take them whenever I travel. Prior to using these, I would just use your basic flip flops. So glad I have these now!
customer_reviews.author: girlscout

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality for shower flops
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted. They're comfortable, compared to other cheap flip flops which tend to hurt. They do a nice job of draining when worn in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's been using these in college for a couple months and they still look relatively new. Well worth the price, quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Educated Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and they work well. They dry out pretty fast too which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for hospital bag!
customer_reviews.text: Fit was somewhat small but my feet were swollen from my last trimester of pregnancy. Bought these for the shower at the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: non-skid, easy to don
customer_reviews.text: I have "tall" feet so they fit a little tightly, but my primary reason for buying them was traction in the shower and they are great at that. I feel safe in them. I'm 60 and disabled.
customer_reviews.author: Jane from Mars

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my large feet and necessary for dorm like living highly recommend. Brought to replace my old ones I managed to get almost a year out of the last ones
customer_reviews.author: Telisa Holland

customer_reviews.title: Love them. They are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They are very comfortable, don't slip in the shoer and the holes allow the water to drain when getting out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Annie in wonderland

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for the shower and they dry quickly so they ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for the shower and they dry quickly so they can go back in the gym bag. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: WylieWabbit

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I am a college student who purchased these shoes. When I wore them for the first time, the holes in the shoes (which claim to be helpful) actually irritated my feet and certainty did not protect them from the bacteria in the shower. Therefore, these shoes do not serve their purpose. I highly advise selecting a different shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great, I love using them to shower at the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I love using them to shower at the gym. My only complaint is that the little holes hurt my feet!
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEE

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very uncomfortable, I have narrow feet, but these are super narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: the holes are a good idea until they start pinching your skin
customer_reviews.text: These flip-flops are definitely not what I expected. Would I buy them again, no. They are really narrow and the plastic part at the top of my foots cuts in to my skin. Also, the holes are a good idea until they start pinching your skin. They aren't worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Delgafell

customer_reviews.title: Best shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with these shoes. I am on a ship so I needed something with good grip for when the ship rocks but that didn't cover my entire foot. They are well vented so the water doesn't stay on the flip flops. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for dorm bathroom. Daughter loves them. Water goes right through flip flop. Dry quick
customer_reviews.author: myleahm

customer_reviews.title: Good Traction
customer_reviews.text: They're incredibly comfortable, and I like the holes which allows water to flow. They have good traction and don't slip in the shower. The only thing I don't like is the smell, but it has begun dissipating after several uses. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: better than the reviews
customer_reviews.text: they dry quickly after shower. feet stay drier on bottom and holes do not make them my feet hurt.
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: love them! my daughter uses them daily at college ...
customer_reviews.text: love them! my daughter uses them daily at college and will be ordering more for my niece when she leaves for school
customer_reviews.author: paula castellano

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear especially in the shower & fits perfectly! A flip flop with a classy design.
customer_reviews.author: Joy O.

customer_reviews.title: They are good so far
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn them once so far. They are a little big, I wear a 7 and I got the 7/8 so I expect them to fit big. They are good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect and I like the support they provide. Really feel good on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and they dry very fast. They're usually dry by the time I'm ready to put them away and get dressed.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisanna Dao

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flops for pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for use at an indoor pool. Love them! comfortable and dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: smurfette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the holes for the water to drain. I feel i can walk normally in wet conditions
customer_reviews.author: Eyly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camping shower shoes! Have had mine about a year and just ordered a pair for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lynzik

customer_reviews.title: Dorm bound
customer_reviews.text: Showed up fast, got for my daughter to use at college in her dorm.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Showere Shoes that look good too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shower shoes to replace a pair I've had for more than 30 years. I definitely like these more than the older version. They go on easily and look fashionable enough to wear as flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: dlalley

customer_reviews.title: Gym shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: Works great for gym shower shoes and it’s a easy pack in the bag. Also seems to dry fast.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: these slops are my barrier between a great shower and an icky
customer_reviews.text: I live with 5 guys, guys are gross in the shower, these slops are my barrier between a great shower and an icky one

customer_reviews.title: Great dorm flip flops
customer_reviews.text: A little big, but perfect for my daughter as she heads to college.

customer_reviews.title: SHOWER SANDALS BASICALLY. LOOKS CUTE & FEELS LIKE IT'S WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: Thick, Comfortable, Haven't tried how well it drains water yet, Will update after a year of usage
customer_reviews.author: Customer R. G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pool area and for public shower areas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for pool area and for public shower areas. Wet feet do not slip and slide inside flip flop.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and dry quickly after taking a shower at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: delbiad

customer_reviews.title: They are great and hold up well
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Antimicrobial sandals. They are great and hold up well. I particularly like that they have a think sole which helps you avoid standing water.

customer_reviews.title: great shower sandals
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, fit is fine and love the anti microbial

customer_reviews.title: Smell like cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: They fit well. Smell like cheap plastic. Comfortable. Good for showers, I guess.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good. However, my feet slip out of them at times.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and work in shower and dry fast when I get out.
customer_reviews.author: carissa

customer_reviews.title: Great shower flip flops! Love em!
customer_reviews.text: I like these poolside/shower flip flops. I went by all the positive reviews and decided to give these a try. So glad I did, no more sudden slips on wet floors. And the heart shaped piercings let all the water slide off. So no more squishing around on bogged down sandals. These are great! My only observation/request is that these cute women's sandals are not made in larger sizes. I got me the largest size 9/10, which is perfect for me. But wanted to get Daughter a pair too, size 11, and was unable to find through here.
customer_reviews.author: GamieTiaBettita

customer_reviews.title: She is wearing them daily so they must be comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife for vacation in Wisconsin dells. She is wearing them daily so they must be comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: Got these for my first year of college to wear them in and out of the shower. Very comfortable and fashionable. Everybody loves them.

customer_reviews.title: ... was suppose to do in the shower I would recommend these to all my friends thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I was very please with showaflops they did excactly what they was suppose to do in the shower I would recommend these to all my friends thanks Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sandal. Wear them almost every day to the pool, spray parks with my kids, sand volleyball, lake, etc. super comfy too!

customer_reviews.title: I like the flip flops a lot but they were on ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the flip flops a lot but they were on the small side. I would recommend buying the next size up.

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of rubber shower shoes for college and was pumped when I found some that had drain holes in the bottom! I wasn't expecting anything of great quality because they were just for the shower but I was so wrong! These are sturdy and seem like they will last for ages!
customer_reviews.author: Sharoni

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes I range from a size 8 1/2 to 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I range from a size 8 1/2 to 9. So I just ended up getting a nine and it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically for shower use and they're nice but not perfect. I was hoping that the holes in these flip flops would help prevent water from pooling under my feet while wearing them. But, they don't really help much. They're nice, just don't expect too much out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: came nicely packaged, super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, came nicely packaged, super comfy, can't wait to use them in college!

customer_reviews.title: Every college kid should have a pair!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals!!! Every college kid should have a pair of these, very comfortable!!

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item.
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong item. I received an off brand of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Expensive snd uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Generally uncomfortable. If you must have shower shoes these will work, but they are expensive. Cheap flip flops from anywhere would do the job.
customer_reviews.author: W. McGahey

product_meta.title: Showaflops Womens' Antimicrobial Shower & Water Sandals for Pool, Beach, Dorm and Gym - Elongated Heart Collection
feature_bullets: The first - and most stylish - flip flops designed to protect your feet from all those places that germs might lurk
Perfect for public showers, gyms, steam rooms, dorms, camps, pools, locker rooms… anywhere your feet take you
Include unique drainage hole designs, antimicrobial layers & slip resistant soles to protect your feet against mold, fungus & bacteria on floors
So comfortable & fun - you will wear them everywhere!
Please see the size chart below for accurate sizing and then… Get Your Flop On!!!
